title: Premium blue/white UI polish for role selection and all login/apply screens

requirements.summary: Upgrade visual design and micro-animations for all login-related screens while keeping the blue/white school theme and preserving existing functionality
acceptanceCriteria: The following pages have noticeably improved styling and motion without changing their core functionality: frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx, VisitorLoginPage.tsx, AdminLoginPage.tsx, StudentLoginPage.tsx, StudentApplyPage.tsx.
All pages remain mobile-responsive and look good at common breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop).
No user-facing text is changed to non-English; existing copy remains simple English.
Animations respect reduced-motion preferences (no distracting looping motion when prefers-reduced-motion is enabled).

file_operations.description: Create a shared auth/page shell that provides a premium blue/white background (subtle gradient + soft decorative shapes), consistent centered container sizing, and motion-safe entrance animations. Use existing shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Card) where appropriate for structure. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add reusable utility classes/keyframes for auth screen polish (e.g., subtle fade/slide, soft glow, decorative shape positioning) and ensure all animations are disabled or simplified under prefers-reduced-motion. Keep the existing theme variables and English copy unchanged.

Refactor to use AuthScreenLayout for the upgraded background and consistent card presentation; enhance card depth/borders/glow and add motion-safe hover/focus micro-interactions without changing login logic, copy, or navigation. Continue using shadcn-ui Card/Input/Button/Label. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Refactor to use AuthScreenLayout; apply premium card styling (depth, refined borders, subtle glow) and cohesive motion-safe animations while preserving admin login logic and existing routes. Continue using shadcn-ui Card/Input/Button/Label. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Refactor to use AuthScreenLayout; apply consistent premium card styling and motion-safe micro-animations while keeping existing student login behavior (including spinner and disabled states) and navigation. Continue using shadcn-ui Card/Input/Button/Label. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Refactor both the application form and the success state to use AuthScreenLayout and consistent premium card styling; add motion-safe transitions while preserving form submission behavior, pending state, and existing copy. Continue using shadcn-ui Card/Input/Button/Label. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Modernize and standardize input and button interactions across login/apply forms (focus, errors, icons, hover/pressed/loading/disabled states)
acceptanceCriteria: Inputs show a clear focus state (ring/border) consistent with the existing Tailwind theme variables.
Error states are visually distinct (border + helper text), and remain accessible (sufficient contrast).
Buttons have consistent hover/active/disabled styling across Visitor/Admin/Student login and Student apply pages.
Existing loading behavior remains correct (e.g., Student login shows spinner when pending; submit buttons disable during pending mutations).

file_operations.description: Create a reusable form field wrapper to standardize spacing, label + helper/error text, optional leading icon slot, and consistent focus/error styling around shadcn-ui Input. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a reusable primary action button wrapper to standardize hover/active/disabled styling and optional loading presentation while delegating behavior to the existing shadcn-ui Button. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Adopt AuthFormField/AuthPrimaryButton to unify focus rings, error presentation, and button interaction states; optionally add a leading icon where appropriate while keeping existing logic (including password visibility toggle) and text unchanged. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Adopt AuthFormField/AuthPrimaryButton to unify focus rings, error presentation, and button states; optionally add a leading icon where appropriate without altering admin password validation logic or copy. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Adopt AuthFormField/AuthPrimaryButton and ensure pending/login spinner behavior remains correct (button disabled while pending, spinner visible); add clearer focus and error visuals without changing any auth/approval routing logic or copy. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Adopt AuthFormField/AuthPrimaryButton to standardize spacing, focus rings, and accessible error visuals (while still using existing toast behavior); ensure submit disabled/loading remains correct and copy unchanged. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Improve Role Selection page with premium card layout/typography, enhanced icon tiles, and cohesive hover/focus motion without changing routes
acceptanceCriteria: Role cards have enhanced visual hierarchy (title/description balance, spacing) and a cohesive premium style matching the updated login screens.
Hover/focus states for role cards are smooth and clear, and do not cause layout shift.
Clicking each role still navigates to the same existing paths (/student-apply, /visitor-login, /admin-login) with SPA behavior.

file_operations.description: Update RoleSelectPage to use the same premium background/shell as the login/apply screens (AuthScreenLayout), refine role card typography/spacing, enhance icon tiles, and add smooth motion-safe hover/focus effects that avoid layout shift; preserve existing navigation targets and routes. Continue using shadcn-ui Card for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the shared auth shell supports the wider Role Selection layout (max width/grid-friendly container) and provides consistent decorative background styling/motion-safe entrance animations to match the login/apply screens. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
